page.title: 16SHOPPERS
page.content:
I am doing a report on shoppers in Burtle and near by.I asked some people that live in Burtle and on the out side of Burtle were abouts they shopped. The majority of people that I asked shopped in Street,Highbridge and Glastonbury.Most went to the grocers and Super Markets . People went to Taunton for cloths and Street for shoes because Clarkes have a factory there. The people that I asked in the village normaly go to the village shop for small daily items. Every week vans come around selling househould goods and fish and meat.
{
